data.actual_result: Menu stays and can cause overlaps (in Ctrl+shift+/ and Ctrl+shift+n)
data.expected_result: The menu you see after right clicking a message in chat goes away after using TAYNE like it does when you click away.
data.short_description: Right clicking on a message then using TAYNE does not remove the right click menu, causing overlap.
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click on a message in chat. - Use a TAYNE keyboard shortcut that opens a menu or moves your channel. (ex. Ctrl+shift+n)
